description:
I wish email wasn't important to marketing. I wish social media and SEO were the only things you needed to do to grow your business online. But that's just not the case. Email marketing continues to be the key to a successful online marketing strategy.

MailChimp is an amazing email marketing platform that is continually innovating and giving you the latest tools to market your company through email.

We'll walk through all the major components of MailChimp so you can get up and running quickly and easily.

Oh! and did I mention MailChimp is totally free for your first 2000 subscribers?

Here is what you will learn:

  • How to properly setup and structure your MailChimp account.
  • How to design an email newsletter that is responsive on a wide variety of devices and looks beautiful.
  • How to engage with your email newsletter audience in new and creative ways.

How this course is structured:

  • Each section is broken up into bite sized video tutorials that you can easily digest and implement step by step.
  • If you can upload a picture to Facebook you can setup a great email marketing program with MailChimp using this training series.

Why take this course:

  • This course will save you hours of time trying to navigate a new tool.
  • You will quickly see how things need to be setup and will get your email newsletter sent in a very short time.
  • Email is still the most powerful way to market to your prospects. This course will show you how to do that quickly and easily.
title: Learn MailChimp from the Ground Up
